{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Purchase Order
| icon           = poe2 penhelms_affidavit icon.png
| description    = "Most Esteemed Arkemyr,

We received your order for two additional ironclad constructs. You can rest assured that they will be delivered within the week. Your continued satisfaction with our craftsmanship affirms that our work goes toward a righteous cause, and we look forward to maintaining your generous patronage."

The missive is stamped with a sigil of Abydon followed by an illegible signature.
